data.title: Shelters & Navigation Centers â€” Illumination Foundation
data.meta_description: Illumination Foundation has multiple state of the art shelters that help with housing and navigation centers operating throughout Los Angeles County, Orange County, and the Inland Empire.
data.meta_site_name: Illumination Foundation | Disrupting The Cycle of Homelessness
data.text:
In January 2020, we were selected by the City of Fullerton to develop and provide recuperative care services for the city of Fullerton.

This state-of-the-art facility is the first of its kind in the United States, created through a public-private partnership and offering navigation and recuperative care beds under one roof. The facility offers clients diversion assistance, crisis evaluation, trauma-informed case management, housing navigation, behavioral health and substance use therapy, transportation services, group and individual enrichment activities led by local partners, accommodations for up to 20 pets, employment services, meals, laundry, security, and storage. Sixty recuperative care beds will provide high utilizers of local emergency rooms with a safe and restful place to recover after hospital discharge and/or illness.
